alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Greene; Hancock; Jasper; Morgan; Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 9:53AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Baldwin, southeastern Morgan, Putnam, northwestern Hancock, east central Monroe, southeastern Greene, northern Jones and eastern Jasper Counties through 1030 AM EST ... At 953 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Godfrey to near Jarrell Plantation, and moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Milledgeville, Eatonton, Gray, Monticello, White Plains, Siloam, Shady Dale, Phoenix, Reynolds at Lake Oconee, Midway-Hardwick, Liberty, Meriwether, Veazey, Bradley, Wayside, Allenwood, Resseaus Crossroads, Round Oak, Central Georgia Experiment Stn, and Plant Harlee Branch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EST for central and east central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin; Greene; Hancock; Jasper; Morgan; Putnam
